title: Ozanam Hall  |  Buildings  |  Campus Maps  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Ozanam Hall 2350 N. Clifton Ave.Chicago, IL 60614 This six-story, air-conditionedresidence hallwas built in 2000 and offers students single and double occupancy semi-suite rooms that share adjoining bathrooms. Students have access to study rooms, kitchenettes and lounges on each floor, a large TV lounge on the first floor and a laundry room on the second floor. Ozanam has a 24-hour staffed security desk, and key card swipe entry is required. Ozanam Hall also includes numerous academic and administrative offices, includingComparative Literature,LGBTQ Studies,Peace, Justice and Conflict Studies,PhilosophyandPublic Policy Studies.
